name: Elemental Demo
description:
OUTDATED VERSION: Get the true beta here: https://sniperninja564.itch.io/elemental

Elemental is all about combining the fast paced linear aspects from Platformers! And the exploration aspects of an Open World Game!

Current Version v0.62

  • Fixed an outline issue with a background!
  • Fixed a major issue with doors
  • Fixed a collision issue

v0.61 Changelog:

  • Fixed the physics engine!

v0.6 (AKA "MEITdev" Update) Changelog:

  • Added Tutorial!
  • Made game much easier! When you die, you no longer lose all of your gems!
  • Added more Environment inside worlds 3&4
  • Added new sounds!
  • Fixed Major Glitch with Doors (Found by myself)!
  • Fixed Wall Jump Bug!
  • More Optimizations!

Special Thanks to MEITdev for analyzing and reviewing my game!

v0.5 Changelog:

  • Added 2 new Snow/Water levels!
  • New tileset!
  • Made major tweaks to the tilesets!
  • Made major tweaks to the Snow BG!
  • Fixed several issues inside the physics engine!
  • Fixed tons of issues with the lag. Game now runs 5% faster!
  • Fixed the version menu button (again)!
v0.4 Changelog:
  • Added 2 new volcano levels!
  • Made minor tweaks inside the levels!
  • Fixed the version menu button!
  • Fixed very minor bugs!

View the rest of the changelog!
